mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_address ( uid, recv_name, recv_province, recv_city, recv_area, recv_district, recv_address, recv_phone, recv_tel, recv_zip, recv_tag, is_default, created_time, created_user, modified_time, modified_user ) VALUES ( #{uid}, #{recvName}, #{recvProvince}, #{recvCity}, #{recvArea}, #{recvDistrict}, #{recvAddress}, #{recvPhone}, #{recvTel}, #{recvZip}, #{recvTag}, #{isDefault}, #{createdTime}, #{createdUser}, #{modifiedTime}, #{modifiedUser} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM t_address WHERE uid=#{uid}

SELECT id, recv_name AS recvName, recv_phone AS recvPhone, recv_district AS recvDistrict, recv_address AS recvAddress, recv_tag AS recvTag, is_default AS isDefault FROM t_address WHERE uid=#{uid} ORDER BY is_default DESC, id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE t_address SET is_default=0 WHERE uid=#{uid}
UPDATE t_address SET is_default=1 WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, uid, recv_name AS recvName, recv_phone AS recvPhone, recv_tel AS recvTel, recv_province AS recvProvince, recv_city AS recvCity, recv_area AS recvArea, recv_district AS recvDistrict, recv_address AS recvAddress, recv_zip AS recvZip, recv_tag AS recvTag, is_default AS isDefault FROM t_address WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT MAX(id) FROM t_address WHERE uid=#{uid}
